text:
Yes, sorry about that - we’re working on an update that will fix this!
Just curious, which internal selector are you using? There are a few. We’ll fix all of them, I’m just curious to know what you’re looking at.

:wave: Apologies for the late reply — we’re making a number of improvements to multi-language content, but I don’t think any of them are sitemap-specific. <@UHM5BT6G5> feel free to correct me.
<@U012ZNRR1H8> can you point to an example where you’re wanting to see a change? The context would be helpful :slightly_smiling_face:
